Brute

{:rpd:images:brute_sprite.png?200|}

Description

A powerful variant of gnolls that serves as a heavy fighter in gnoll groups.

Stats

  • HP: High
  • Attack Skill: High
  • Defense Skill: Moderate
  • Damage: High
  • Exp for Kill: Moderate to high

Special Abilities

  • High Health: More HP than regular gnolls
  • Strong Attacks: Inflicts significant damage
  • Group Tactics: Often found with other gnolls

Notes

Gnoll Brutes are stronger, more durable versions of regular gnolls that serve as their heavy fighters. They're typically found in gnoll encampments and groups.087df4a8853cb3229502316f929e70fc6db6790
